sum_bart: Ahluwalia Contracts, Ltd. (India) Limited is an engineering, design and construction company. It is registered in New Delhi, India. It has an office at A-177, Okhla Industrial Area, Phase-I, New Delhi-110020. It also has offices in Mumbai, Kolkata and Calcutta.
sum_peg: Dear Sir/Madam, we wish to inform you that the Company has been identified as a Large Corporate by the Compliance Department of the National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.

sum_bart: Ahluwalia Contracts (India) Ltd is an engineering, design and construction company. It is based in New Delhi and has offices in Mumbai and Kolkata. It has received an award for a project worth Rs. 396.50 Crores.
sum_peg: We wish to inform you that Ahluwalia Contracts (India) Ltd has secured an order from Godrej Properties Ltd for the construction of all the Towers (1,2,T3 & Tighigh).
